data.title: Finland
data.text:
Finland has been a member of the International Labour Organization since 1920. The ILO is devoted to promoting social justice and internationally recognised human and labour rights, through a decent work agenda.

ILO activities in Finland are coordinated by the Regional Office for Europe and Central Asia.

Explore the Finland - ILO partnership page.
